Package seng202.team3.view

Class ConfirmationWindow

java.lang.Object
seng202.team3.view.ConfirmationWindow
public class ConfirmationWindow extends Object
This class holds the information for windows that open after a certain user action has happened. This confirms information with the user that their input has been properly handled, or gives necessary information to the user about what they have reported.

    • openReportedWindow

      public void openReportedWindow​(String confirmationStr)
      Opens a window when a user reports a new crime with all valid inputs.
      Parameters:
      confirmationStr - String hashed ID of the ID of the crime, used for when a user goes to edit their crime

    • openEditedWindow

      public void openEditedWindow()
      Opens a window when a user successfully edits or deletes a crime

    • showStage

      public void showStage​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane root, int width, int height)
      Opens a JavaFX window and handles the initializer for it
      Parameters:
      root - main root pane to be displayed
      width - width of the window
      height - height of the window
